subject: Welcome To
body:
Welcome To 
Charles Schwab Bank Headquarters
     Address: 3000 Schwab Way,
     Westlake, Texas 76262,
     United States of America
     Email: 
bannewsone132@outlook.com
 
Bank Website: www. schwab.com
     Phone: +1 800-435-4000
Dear beneficially email-ID
Charles Schwab Bank Corporation received instruction on your behalf from United States Government, International monitoring Fund and World Bank Group to credited your part winning payment sum of US$25.5Million into a new ATM Visa card in your name and send it to you as soon as you agree with our bank ATM services terms 2023.
Charles Schwab Bank Corporation is an American multinational financial services company. It offers banking, commercial banking, investing and related services including consulting, and wealth management advisory services.
This new ATM Visa card Charles Schwab Bank United States will send to you now can be used to withdrawal sum of US$5,000 every per day transaction equivalent to any local currency in the whole world until your withdrawal total sum of Twenty-Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars sign in your name.
 
You will use the new ATM Visa card system to transfer money to any Bank of your choice in your country with maximum amount of US$100,000 every day transaction through POS or any bank has ATM Automatic Machine at your convenient time, You can also purchase stuffs online with your new ATM Visa card as its secure and safe until you withdrawal full amount of US$25.5 Million sign.
For Urgent Delivery your ATM Visa card and all payment documents to you, below is your personal information required for easier delivery your ATM Master Card to you before three days today. please forward to  
banskaggs@citlink.net
Your Full Name::..........
Your Full Address:.....
Your Direct Phone Numbers:............
A copy of your ID Card or driving License needed
:....
Please note that we only using FedEx Worldwide Courier Services Company to deliver your ATM Card to you because it is the only company, we signed a contract with so far, so we can actually monitor the delivery of your ATM Card online to avoid lost.
The FedEx Worldwide Courier Company United States responsible for your ATM Card 
shipment required delivery Insurance fees US$75 only.
Delivery Fees: ............US$35
ATM Package Insurance Fees:.......US$15
Custom/Immigration Paper clearance Documents fees: US$25.00
Total Fees: ........US$75
To avoid fraud, you can contact FedEx Worldwide Courier Company agent incharge of your ATM Shipment yourself for verification.
FedEx Corier GROUND,
233 Cravens Rd, Missouri City, TX 77489, United States
Phone:  +1 800-463-3339
The reason you must send US$75.00 Gift Card needed for your ATM Insurance Delivery fees is because your funds is sign protected by United States Government and European Credit Union Fund Insurance cooperation which prevent us from deducting the fees US$75.00 from your payment files until the total fund in ATM Card delivered to you as really beneficiary because that is agreement sign on your fund grant files before approval with us.
So, get back to us in time as soon as possible with your full information require because you must pay for your ATM CARD delivery fees before we can register your ATM Card and all documents backup your payment files with FedEx Worldwide Courier Company for urgent delivery to you and all shipping details, including Shipment Receipts and Tracking Number will be releasing to you once you send your shipment information along with delivery fees US$75.00 only.
Thank you for Cooperation as we are looking forward to hear from you soonest.
Best regards
Walter W Bettinger II
Chief Executive Officer
Charles Schwab Bank Headquarters
Email: 
bannewsone132@outlook.com
Phone: +1 800-435-40000
Signed by Rick Wurster
President of the Charles Schwab Bank
3000 Schwab Way, Westlake, Texas 76262,
United States of America
Email: 
banskaggs@citlink.net
Bank Website: www. schwab.com

subject: Re: Welcome To
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Charles Schwab Bank. I appreciate the information you have provided about your services and the opportunity to receive a new ATM Visa card. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how this process works? How will the funds be transferred to the ATM Visa card?

2. Is there a specific reason why I need to provide a copy of my ID card or driving license? How will this information be used?

3. Could you please provide more information about the Worldwide Courier Company that will be handling the delivery of the ATM card? How can I ensure that it is a reliable and secure service?

4. I noticed that there are fees associated with the delivery of the ATM card, such as insurance fees and custom paper clearance documents fees. Are these fees mandatory? Can they be deducted from the funds on the ATM card instead?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Thomas
